自己上錯飲料態度奇差無比，上錯的飲料有要他自己貼錢嗎？
一直不斷爭論，最後讓他去重做，轉身就走噎， 好可怕的地方，永遠不會再去。
EN:
A male service staff spoke rudely to the other people's incredible, not like the service of the five -star hotel at all.

Original:
一直是珍珠酒吧、山里日本料理的忠實客戶。但最近幾次去對於座位編排的堅持，感到莫名其妙。本身幾乎沒有客人的情形下，二人用餐塞在門口二人的位置。乍看當然非常合理，但事實上二人桌面上根本放不下二人的餐點加飲料，結果服務人員竟然將杯子茶壺放上旁邊較高的櫃子上。非常不專業。

我們因為常來，知道放不下進去的時候主動提出，但仍然被拒絕，認為要坐四人的位子就要低消x4。

看到我們點了兩份飲料加兩份餐點，加上我們有所微言，才來說可以換位子。但還是堅持因為我們點了超過兩個人的低消，所以能夠換位子。

這樣不如讓客人在坐下前要先點餐，確定有低消x4的額度再決定可以坐什麼位子。不要當酒吧了，轉型做快餐店吧。

連重視翻桌率的茶餐廳都會按照當時繁忙的程度調整，如果真的客人太多才會要求客戶坐特定的位子。

要知道，珍珠酒吧我去這麼多次，從來都沒有客人超過1/3。一般來說，作為五星飯店的服務，客戶因為商務要求等希望坐到比較大的位子，如果在容許的範圍下，都會盡量滿足客人的要求。但明顯，珍珠酒吧把翻桌率跟每座位收入凌駕於客人的需求上。但他們這樣做也不會提升平均單價因為酒吧本身也坐不滿。只會趕走客人。

飯店的酒吧咖啡廳，他對客人的功能，常常是商務會面的場所，而不是以用餐為主。把杯子茶壺放到櫃子上的行為，讓我眼界大開。我從來沒有在五星飯店的酒吧跟咖啡廳遭遇過這樣的事情。

如果客人還是房客呢？低消？晚餐時間客人也不多低消到底有何意義？難道客人會進去吃個餅乾再叫杯免費開水嗎？

疫情的確讓很多管理人員失智失能。本來是西華飯店二樓酒吧的常客，西華倒閉前的疫情期間酒吧中午不營業改來大倉，一年下來去光顧的次數不能說頻繁，但總會有個十次以上，這幾次領教了管理上的改變後，決定以後商務會晤另找適合的地方。不然為了座位的安排，在我的夥伴客人前失禮，實在得不償失。

（看到其他留言發覺不但有低消 還限時，原來怕客人把酒吧當starbucks）呵呵
EN:
It has always been a loyal customer of Pearl Bar and Shanli Japanese cuisine.But in the past few times, I have felt inexplicable.In the case of almost no guests, the two meals stuffed their positions at the door.At first glance, it was very reasonable, but in fact, the two people could not put the meal for the two on the table. As a result, the service staff actually put the cup teapot on the higher cabinet next to it.Very unprofessional.

Because we often come, we know that when we ca n’t put it in, we are proactively proposed, but we are still rejected, thinking that the seat of the four people will be lower X4.

Seeing that we ordered two beverages and two meals, and we had a little words, we could change the place.But still insist that because we ordered more than two people's low disappearance, we can change the place.

In this way, it is better to let the guests order before sitting down, and determine that there is a low X4 quota before deciding what seats to sit.Don't be a bar, transform as a fast food restaurant.

Even the tea restaurant that values ​​the table rate will be adjusted according to the degree of busyness at that time. If there are too many guests, they will ask customers to sit in a specific seat.

You know, I went to the pearl bar so many times, and there were never more than 1/3 of the guests.Generally speaking, as a service for the five -star restaurant, customers want to sit in a relatively large seat because of business requirements, and if they are allowed, they will try to meet the customer's requirements as much as possible.However, obviously, the pearl bar has survived the turnover rate and each seat to the needs of guests.But they do not increase the average unit price because the bar itself is also dissatisfied.It will only drive away the guests.

The bar cafe in the restaurant, his functions of guests are often a place for business meetings, not mainly dining.The behavior of putting the cup teapot on the cabinet made me visually open.I have never encountered such a thing in the bar and cafe in the five -star hotel.

What if guests or tenants?Low eliminates?What is the significance of dinner time?Will the guests go in to eat a biscuit and call a cup free boiling water?

The epidemic does cause many managers to be degraded.Originally, it was a frequent guest of the bar on the second floor of the Xihua Hotel. During the epidemic before the closure of Xihua, the bar did not change at noon. After teaching the management changes, it was decided to find another suitable place in the future.Otherwise, for the arrangement of the seat, it was out of favor in front of my partner and guests.

(Seeing other messages, I found that not only low and low, but also for the time, I was afraid that the guests would take the bar as Starbucks)

Original:
這是位於台北大倉久和大飯店內的酒吧。
氣氛也很好。
雞尾酒🍸和無酒精雞尾酒🍸都非常美味♪
焦糖布丁🍮 布丁佐香草冰淇淋已經很受歡迎了！ ️ 哈哈。
當然巧克力蛋糕也很好吃😋
我其實想去屋頂酒吧，但這是正確的選擇👍
我在台北度過了愉快的最後一晚。
謝謝。
是賽修~💛
EN:
This is a bar located in Taipei Okura Johisa.
The atmosphere is also very good.
Chicken tails and no alcoholic cocktails are very delicious ♪
Caramel pudding 丁 Pudding vanilla ice cream is already very popular!️ Haha.
Of course chocolate cake is also delicious 😋
I actually want to go to the roof bar, but this is the right choice 👍
I spent the last night in Taipei.
Thanks.
It's Sai Xiu ~ ~

Original: 儘管品質和氛圍都很好，但我不能給 5 顆星，因為下午 6 點後充電 600 分鐘有點高。晚餐前想喝一杯，想試試這個地方，但不得不急著喝兩杯。不太好玩，充電300分鐘就夠了。
EN: Although the quality and atmosphere are good, I can't give 5 stars because it is a bit high for 600 minutes after 6 pm.I want to have a drink before dinner, I want to try this place, but I have to rush to drink two glasses.Not very fun, it is enough to charge for 300 minutes.

Original: 工作人員非常友好，燈光昏暗，讓人很舒服。
EN: The staff is very friendly, the lights are dim, making people very comfortable.

Original:
中午就可以喝酒，雖然是酒吧，但在一樓，沒有門，進去很方便🎶咖啡和水果薄餅也很好吃🍓💕
我們還有會說流利日語的工作人員✨
我可以用嬰兒車帶孩子，但他們要求我保持安靜😂 …
EN:
You can drink at noon. Although it is a bar, there are no doors on the first floor. It is very convenient to go in 🎶 coffee and fruit pancakes.
We also have the staff who speak fluent Japanese ✨
I can use a baby car to bring children, but they ask me to keep quiet ...

Original:
原本我們打算使用飯店的免費飲料券，但查看雞尾酒單後，我們選擇了兩杯雞尾酒。  我們有：

1) 苦味開胃雞尾酒佐葡萄柚灌木

2) 莫吉托配鹹楊桃

兩者都很棒！多麼好的驚喜啊！
一定會回來的。
EN:
Originally we planned to use the free drink coupon of the restaurant, but after checking the cocktail list, we chose two cups of cocktails.We have:

1) Bit and appetizer cocktail grapefruit shrub

2) Mogoto with salty stalks

Both are great!What a good surprise!
Will definitely come back.

Original:
這是一家日本主題酒店的高級酒吧。飲料的價格反映了這一點，但服務、氣氛都是一流的。
請注意，如果您在下午來訪，工作人員會在傍晚時分接近您，警告您夜間價格是否上漲，即如果您想在晚上喝酒或用餐，則需要付費
請注意，我沒有食物。
EN:
This is a high -end bar of a Japanese -themed hotel.The price of beverages reflects this, but the service and atmosphere are first -class.
Please note that if you visit in the afternoon, the staff will approach you in the evening to warn whether you have risen at night, that is, if you want to drink or dine at night, you need to pay
Please note that I have no food.

Original: 美麗的調酒師將為您調製一杯美妙的飲品。
EN: The beautiful bartender will prepare a wonderful drink for you.

EN: Drink a good place!

Original: 週六最低訂購量為 800 美元（= 267 瑞典克朗）。因此，不可能在這家酒吧只點一種啤酒。一文不值。
EN: The lowest order volume on Saturday was $ 800 (= 267 Swedish Krona).Therefore, it is impossible to order only one kind of beer in this bar.It's worthless.

EN: A few days ago, I met with two friends in this place.We like the quality of tea or coffee, enjoy spacious space, and appreciate high -quality services.

EN: The bakery on the first floor provides some options, which tastes good and special, such as barbecue, whole wheat toast, lemon pound cake, don't miss it.
